title: So every year, there will be a new Sion-level rework on an old champion?
body:
Last year, we had, wel... {{champion:14}}. Now this year we have {{champion:78}} as the next Sion-level rework, since her rework is even being presented as if she was a new champion.

I wonder if we will have another Sion-level rework next year. I hope that {{champion:9}} is the next candidate for such a rework since his kit is really outdated, he has so many problems, and his visuals and voice over are outdated too. Either him, or {{champion:19}}, because WW suffers from the same problems as Fiddlesticks, on an arguably way worse level.

Our intent with Sion and Poppy was always to try and preserve their thematic identities while addressing the major kit problems they had. We didn't feel that 2 button click stun burst mage fit giant undead warrior, nor that low counterplay assassin with an extreme power curve was the right way to do valiant yordle warrior, hence the class changes.
